features: NEW IMPROVED ECO-FRIENDLY BOTTLE Our new aluminum packaging not only will stand out on your counter, it also helps to protect the efficacy of the essential oils inside. Our recyclable products are environmentally friendly and animal cruelty-free.

PERFECT 7.0 pH FORMULA: Our balanced formula will help maintain and restore your mouth’s ecosystem, helping boost your overall immune system. A lot of what we consume on a daily basis is too acidic coffee, wine, sports drinks. ORL mouthwash helps reverse the damage from low acidity
ORGANIC XYLITOL Organic Xylitol helps to whiten your teeth, reduce the risk of gum disease & gingivitis, strengthen and reduced dry mouth without the need for fluoride
REDUCES SENSITIVITY Perfect for Sensitive Teeth. ORL’s gluten-free blend of all-natural and vegan ingredients will fight cavities, enrich your enamel, and support healthy gums.

EFFECTIVE, SAFE, NATURAL INGREDIENTS Ever wonder what’s in your mouthwash? ORL proudly makes products free from over 100 harmful ingredients commonly found in most mouthwash brands. Our products are free of fluoride and alcohol. ORL’s blend of plant-based essential oils, vitamins, and natural flavors results in a safe to swallow formula

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this stuff
reviews.reviewText: Great mouthwash for kids! My daughter loves the taste.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Taste great, No More fighting to brush
reviews.reviewText: My daughter loves the flavor. She is special needs and can be difficult to perform oral hygiene on. She is 37 and we have used this for the last year or so. There is rarely any pushback now. I brush with toothpaste, and then finsh off by brushing again with this and she gladly lets me. It was never this easy before. 6 thumbs up. Mine hers and Daddy too!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Taste is off
reviews.reviewText: I love the aluminum bottle, the size, and how the bottle is designed (unlike standard bottles of mouthwash, which tend to be huge in a small bathroom). But the flavor is off-putting and the texture of the liquid is…odd. I’ll keep using it up but I won’t repurchase

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Product came banged up and leaking. I bought the mint and also the bubblegum for my son. Was not aware it contained polysorbate 80. Not happy about this. It's got a very weird consistency. It's got a thickness I find unpleasant. A bit like slime. Expensive and every time I used it, whether I use the cap or administer straight from the bottle, when you put the cap back on, the neon yellow mouthwash drips down the white metal container and is just a mess. I also don't like metal container because even though may people think it is healthy/safe, it is not. The metal typically leeches into the product. I am not saying it does with this one, however toxic heavy metals are the worst toxins out there. I wasn't aware the bottle was metal when I purchased it and I don't believe they tell you in the description. At $20 a bottle, and having gotten 2, I am not pleased. My son doesn't like the bubblegum, either, saying it's not pink, but also doesn't like the taste. Also, the reason I got them to begin with was to avoid unnatural preservatives. Only to find out once we get them they contain polysorbate 80. I may not have read the list of ingreds carefully enough (all other ingreds are natural) but omg what a freaking ripoff, for a gross, messy, metal-contained, bottle of mouthwash that, quite frankly, visually resembles toxic waste.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This mouthwash was very thick and yellow. It has a sweet taste and was definitely different than anything my family and I have ever tried. It was strange at first because you do not expect mouthwash to be so thick or sweet. However, we ended up really enjoying it. The kids liked that it didn't burn like the other one they were using and it still did a great job keeping their teeth healthy and the bad breath away!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 3, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Tastes good, works well
reviews.reviewText: I like bubblegum flavor but I'm not a huge fan of it, but this is very good. It's got just enough flavor to taste good without being sickenly sweet or strong tasting. It's just pleasant. There's a little bit that's weird about this. The bottle is metal and feels weird for mouthwash, and the mouthwash itself is a yucky color of yellow and thicker than I would have ever expected a mouthwash to be. How much prefer to just get a swig then to ever look at it. If I just get a swig and don't look at it I have a very pleasant experience overall and like it. If I look at it first well, it looks on appetizing and that's a little bit of a downer though it's still good once I get in my mouth and start using it. It does a great job of freshening breath. It's got a little bit of a burn but it's not a strong burn like alcohol. The rest of my family is also using this mouthwash and we all agree that we like it but we don't like to look at it- maybe we're just all used to pink mouthwashes because our normal brand that we have used for years is pink.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars love the flavor

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 2, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Unique flavor, great results
reviews.reviewText: The Cinnamint flavor is delicious! Cinnamony but not hot cinnamon with a touch of mint.The packaging is unique! It comes in a metal-like bottle. I am unsure of what the bottle is made of, but it has that on the go drink container vibe. Unscrew the cap and you will notice the mouthwash is a yellow color. Don't fear! It's supposed to be. It's also thicker than standard mouthwashes. That's also good because it gives a pleasant mouth feel.You don't need a lot of this mouthwash to get results. Try a little at first and increase as needed. The thickness goes a long way when you swish around your mouth. You will immediately feel like your teeth are smoother and cleaner. There is no burn, at least there wasn't for me.The refreshment lasted about two hours. I find myself wanting to rinse my mouth a few times a day with this product, as it has such a nice taste and feel. I did not expect that from mouthwash and am really pleased. I did not notice my teeth looking whiter but I've only used it a few days. My teeth for sure feel smooth and clean after using.
